AI Description: PyPy is a fast, compliant alternative implementation of the Python programming language. It aims to provide a high-performance, flexible, and efficient interpreter for Python, while maintaining compatibility with the CPython reference implementation.
Core Features:
1. Just-in-time compilation for improved speed
2. Reduced memory usage compared to CPython
3. Compatibility with existing Python code and libraries
4. Support for multiple Python versions
5. Built-in garbage collection
6. Cross-platform support
General Tags: Python Interpreter, Alternative Implementation, Just-In-Time Compilation, High Performance
